price: 82. Waana Kan aan rajeeyo inuu ii dhaafo gefkayga Maalinta Abaal marinta (Qiyaamada).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لِي خَطِيٓـَٔتِي يَوۡمَ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī aṭmaʿu an yaghfira lī khaṭīatī yawma al-dīni
